name: Poonam Sharma
snippet: I visited this hospital for my dog who needed help so urgently and doctor helped me out so quickly. Thanks Kasi for suggesting me this hospital. :)

name: kasipavan mannem
snippet: Very nice people. Its a very nice pets Hospital. They helped me with a food prescription my dog needed. They are very helpful.Very knowledgeable Doctor, great interaction with pets and owners.

name: Meeravail Vadapallimeeravali
snippet: Yes,it's very good hospital/clinic.we went for our Lab dog left leg limping ,doctor has gave some injection and medicines and next day itself it got worked miraculously and my pet is fine now..doctor also very good  and nice

name: Bhavanam Sudhakara Reddy
snippet: I am very happy for the SV Pet Hospital in our Addanki. Doctor treated well one of my friends dog suffering with life threatening enteritis. It is one of the most unique pet lover spot for any issues with our pets.

name: Kasu pradeep reddy
snippet: My dog was suffering from vomitings and was lazy and not well. I visited this pet hospital and the docter was super professional and I liked his service. He showed good hospitality I would definetly recommend this docter.

name: bharat a
snippet: Yes,it's very good hospital/clinic.we went for our Lab dog left leg limping ,doctor has gave some injection and medicines and next day itself it got worked miraculously and my pet is fine now..doctor also very good guy..

name: Bhagya Raj Anand
snippet: Doctor with kind heart and commitment.
